mapper.select: SELECT nvl(count(*),0) FROM( SELECT s.show_num num, s.show_name title, t.schedule_date showDate, t.cntDate cntDate, s.show_check status FROM show s RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT show_num, schedule_date, nvl(count(*),0)cntDate FROM schedule GROUP BY schedule_date, show_num)t ON s.show_num = t.show_num order by schedule_date desc )

SELECT a.*,ROWNUM timeRow FROM( SELECT w.show_num num, show_name title, schedule_date showDate, schedule_time dateTime, schedule_YN dateStatus FROM show w RIGHT JOIN schedule d ON w.show_num = d.show_num WHERE w.show_num=#{showNum} and schedule_date=#{showDate} ORDER BY schedule_time)a
select schedule_time, schedule_date, schedule_yn from schedule where show_num = #{show_num} order by schedule_date desc, schedule_time
select count(schedule_date) from schedule where show_num = #{show_num} group by schedule_date order by schedule_date desc
